description: React hook module managing a todo list with local storage sync, including functions for creating, toggling, editing, and deleting todos.

methods.name: createTodo(title)
methods.description: Creates a new todo object with a unique id, title, timestamps, and completed status.

methods.name: useTodos()
methods.description: React hook managing todos state, CRUD operations, and local storage synchronization.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo with the specified title to the list.

methods.name: toggleTodo
methods.description: Toggles the completed status of a todo by id.

methods.name: deleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a todo by id and resets editing state if necessary.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Sets a todo into edit mode by id.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves changes to a todo's title and updates its timestamp.
